trans-unit.source: The base class for the exceptions that are thrown when the quota of nodes inspected by a filter is exceeded.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class.
The message to accompany the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains all the data required to deserialize the exception.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the source and destination of the stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a collection of the filters that exceeded the quota of nodes.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref>s that exceeded the quota of nodes.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the inner exception that caused the current exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the current exception to be thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterException"></xref> class, the inner exception that caused the current exception, and a collection of the filters that exceeded the quota of nodes.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the current exception to be thrown.
The collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref>s that exceeded the quota of nodes.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref>s that exceeded the quota of nodes.
The collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref>s that exceeded the quota of nodes.
